## RangeOf class

Simple implementation of a possibly open-ended range of some comparable type `<T>` with test and formatting.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class RangeOf<T> implements RangeOfProperties<T> 
```
**Implements:** [RangeOfProperties](./ts-utils.rangeofproperties.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

## Constructors

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(min, max)](./ts-utils.rangeof._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a new [RangeOf&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.rangeof.md)<!-- -->. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [max?](./ts-utils.rangeof.max.md) | <code>readonly</code> | T | _(Optional)_ Maximum extent of the range. |
|  [min?](./ts-utils.rangeof.min.md) | <code>readonly</code> | T | _(Optional)_ Minimum extent of the range. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [check(t)](./ts-utils.rangeof.check.md) |  | Checks if a supplied value is within this range. |
|  [createRange(init)](./ts-utils.rangeof.createrange.md) | <code>static</code> | Static constructor for a [RangeOf&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.rangeof.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [findTransition(t)](./ts-utils.rangeof.findtransition.md) |  | Finds the transition value that would bring a supplied value <code>t</code> into range. |
|  [format(format, formats)](./ts-utils.rangeof.format.md) |  | Formats this range using the supplied format function. |
|  [includes(t)](./ts-utils.rangeof.includes.md) |  | Determines if a supplied value is within this range. |
|  [propertiesToString(range, formats, emptyValue)](./ts-utils.rangeof.propertiestostring.md) | <code>static</code> | Gets a formatted description of a [RangeOfProperties&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.rangeofproperties.md) given an optional set of formats and 'empty' value to use. |
|  [toFormattedProperties(format)](./ts-utils.rangeof.toformattedproperties.md) |  | Formats the minimum and maximum values of this range. |
